"Both times he provided a top quality design that I was able to offer my client." "Great company with a very knowledgeable staff and attention to detail." "Overall, Living Water Custom Pools delivered an outstanding product and service."

Living waters custom pools is absolutely the best pool builder in DFW. I have been dreaming of a pool for 15 years and after researching multiple pool companies in the Dallas area, I spoke with Julia and Paul and knew they were the company … More Response from the owner 7 months ago Stephanie, thank you so much for your review! Also for trusting us with your family’s pool and outdoor living. We appreciate you guys! ❤️

Paul and Julia Collins are super nice people who stand behind their word and work, and Paul is a talented pool designer! … More Response from the owner 2 years ago Kirk,  Thank you for the kind words, your back yard is truly one of a kind. Great job on the pictures too!

We love our pool, and Living Water turned our back yard into a beautiful place we want to spend as much time in as possible. From design to construction, the crew was easy to work with. No construction project is completely easy, but they … More Response from the owner 2 years ago Thank you for the honest review. We enjoyed partnering with you and kudos on the selections! We appreciate your patience and enjoyed bringing collaborative vision to life!
